howToPlay.headline: This is how you play the game!
howToPlay.message:
Placements:
- Drag and drop your ships into the grid!
- Right- or doubleclick ships to turn them
- Hit the save button when you are finished, and wait 'till your opponent is done as well!

Attacking:
- After the placements... to attack, klick on a field on the opponent grid
- if you hit, its your turn again, if not it´s your oponnents turn
- see where your opponent has hit you on your own field
